About
Pool Store & Pool Service Company Serving Lake City, Gainesville, High Springs, Alachua & Surrounding Areas
Kirsplash Pools was established in the ‘70s as a residential and commercial pool contractor building inground concrete pools throughout North Central Florida. While we enjoyed the building aspect of the industry, it wasn’t until we opened our first
pool supply store
in
Lake City
that we found our passion.
Our true love is helping area homeowners with the daily maintenance of their pools. With our sole focus on providing reliable
pool service
and
maintenance
, as well as the best pool and hot tub care products available, you can count on Kirsplash Pools to handle all of your pool care needs.
Our Commitment to You
When you choose to work with Kirsplash Pools you’re choosing a company dedicated to superior customer service in all that we do. Whether we’re working with you to pick the best
above ground
or
semi-inground pool
and connecting you with our network of reputable installers, or we’re caring for your pool as if it were our own, you can always expect to be welcomed to the Kirsplash Pools family.
Pool
and
hot tub
ownership are meant to be enjoyed. We look forward to making it as seamless as possible. We only offer the best products and equipment available from today’s top manufacturers, so when you step foot in one of our two conveniently located pool supply stores in
Gainesville
and
Lake City
you’ll find everything you need to keep your water clean, clear, and healthy.
Contact Us Today
It’s time to make every day a backyard vacation! Give the pool care experts at Kirsplash Pools a
call
or come
visit us
today. Our knowledgeable pool care experts are ready to help bring your vision to life and give you the ultimate pool ownership experience.
[  CONTAINER  ]
[  ENTRY-CONTENT  ]
[  POST-#  ]
